title: Dealmaster: Summer savings on laptops, smartphones, and smartwatches
content:
CCCCCCCCC

If you haven't started your summer vacation, you can be opportunistic and save money by refreshing your laptop. We've rounded up some of the top deals from Apple, Dell, HP, and Lenovo if you need a new laptop or mobile workstation.

If you extend your personal computing to your phone or your wrist, the start of summer also brings some meaningful savings on smartphones and smartwatches. And if you have a kid in the house, it's never too early to think about back-to-school items. So whether you're shopping for yourself or finding gear for your kids, check out our curated list of personal computing deals.
